short_summary: Purchase 2 Autonomous Underwater Vehicles (AUVs) and optional additional AUV prior to March 31, 2024.
description: The Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) in St. John's, Newfoundland and Labrador, requires two (2) Autonomous Underwater Vehicles (AUV) and an option to purchase an additional AUV before March 31, 2024. The AUV must be delivered to the DFO before March 31, 2024. The bid must comply with the requirements of the bid solicitation and meet the mandatory technical evaluation criteria to be declared responsive.
full_summary:
**F6160-230009 Autonomous Underwater Vehicle (AUV) Invitation to Tender**
====================================================================

**Reference Number:** WS4398598746-Doc4399019371
**Amendment Number:** 2
**Publication Date:** January 17, 2024
**Tender Closing Date:** February 8, 2024, at 2:00 PM EST
**Amendment Date:** February 6, 2024

**Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GDS) - GD
**Procurement Method:** Competitive Bidding
**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal

**Description:**
The Department of Fisheries and Oceans, St. John's, Newfoundland and Labrador, invites bids for two (2) Autonomous Underwater Vehicles (AUVs) with an option to purchase an additional AUV by March 31, 2024. Deliverables must be received by the Department on or before March 31, 2024.

**Selection Criteria:**
The bid with the lowest evaluated price that meets the mandatory technical evaluation criteria will be recommended for contract award. The Department may provide a debriefing to bidders who requested it within 15 working days from the receipt of the notification that their bid was unsuccessful.

**Trade Agreements:**
This tender is open to bidders who are eligible to participate in the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)

**Regions of Delivery:** This tender is specific to the Department of Fisheries and Oceans, St. John's, Newfoundland and Labrador. The successful bidder will be responsible for delivering the AUVs to this location.

**Contracting Entity:**
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is the contracting entity for this procurement.

**Contact Information:**
For more information, please contact:

Martin, Lisa (SPAC/PSPC)
Phone: [
